title: Imam at the masjid makes dua qunoot in dhuhr & asr prayer, can I say Ameen? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: sri lanka he says the message that jason to my house they now do kunut in the last raka of can i say i mean the answer is yes you can say i mean i'm not going to go into whether this is halal or haram this is veda or not this is an issue of ishtihad i'm not going to go into why aren't they making it in fajr maghrib as well so punit should be in the five prayers i will not go into that your question was can i say i mean the answer is you can ali
